posts.title: mac 搭建hexo 新手学习
posts.text: 安装自制软件homebrew ruby -e "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install)" 安装nodejs brew install node 安装hexo sudo npm install -g hexo 密码为电脑admin密码 创建博客文件夹 1 mkdir blog 2 cd blog 3 hexo init 此时blog文件下会生成很多文件和文件夹，如下图 生成一套静态网页 hexo generate 在服务器上运行 hexo server 这时就可以在浏览器中输入http://localhost:4000查看网站首页配置 与github账户关联 首先你得有一个github账号,并新建一个名为[your_arrount].github.io的仓库。 然后打开前面创建的blog目录下的_config.yml文件，再修改最下方的deploy为： 冒号后面一定要给空格 1234deploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/your_arrount/your_arrount.github.io.git branch: master 安装hexo的git部署 npm install hexo-deployer-git -S 最后将生成静态页面部署到github的仓库中 hexo d -g 当提示info deploy done:git 即上传成功，这时就可以通过https://your_account.github.io来 访问你的博客了 hexo的基本配置 以下上hexo配置文件_config.yml的基本内容和基本设置，更多个性化设置请参考官方文档 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869# Hexo Configuration## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html## Source: https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/# Site ##页面信息title: Who's Blog ##标题，即浏览器标签栏显示的内容subtitle: Why so serious? ##副标题description: ##描述，简介author: Charles Wei ##作者language: zh-CN ##语言timezone: Asia/Shanghai ##时区# URL## If your site is put in a subdirectory, set url as 'http://yoursite.com/child' and root as '/child/'url: http://wwww.charleswei.me ##域名，后面自定义域名后，写在这里，用 .github.io的话，这里用默认的不用改root: /permalink: :year/:month/:day/:title/permalink_defaults:# Directory ##文件目录，可不改source_dir: sourcepublic_dir: publictag_dir: tagsarchive_dir: archivescategory_dir: categoriescode_dir: downloads/codei18n_dir: :langskip_render:# Writing ##静态页面生成属性，可不改new_post_name: :year-:month-:day-:title.md # File name of new postsdefault_layout: posttitlecase: false # Transform title into titlecaseexternal_link: true # Open external links in new tabfilename_case: 0render_drafts: falsepost_asset_folder: falserelative_link: falsefuture: truehighlight: enable: true line_number: true auto_detect: false tab_replace:# Category & Tag ##标签，可不改default_category: uncategorizedcategory_map:tag_map:# Date / Time format ##时间格式，可不改## Hexo uses Moment.js to parse and display date## You can customize the date format as defined in## http://momentjs.com/docs/#/displaying/format/date_format: YYYY-MM-DDtime_format: HH:mm:ss# Pagination ##每页显示文章数，按需改## Set per_page to 0 to disable paginationper_page: 10pagination_dir: page# Extensions ##主题设置## Plugins: https://hexo.io/plugins/## Themes: https://hexo.io/themes/theme: indigo# Deployment ##git部署关联## Docs: https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.htmldeploy: type: git repo: https://github.com/dalianmao97/dalianmao97.github.io.git branch: master 最后生成部署 1 hexo clean 2 hexo d -g 然后就gogogo

posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
